name: PathToWindowOrDoor
description:
# PathToWindowOrDoor v1 ___ Welcome to PathToWindowOrDoor. This script helps quickly convert 2 point line paths to the new windows or doors ### Using PathToWindowOrDoor The script will convert dynamic lighting lines used as doors or windows that are on the map layer or on the DL layer.Beware, only "paths" with 1 line (2 coords, 2 clics not one more) will be converted to door/windows as they are only representing 2 handles at the moment ### Basic Command Syntax The script uses a standardized API command syntax. All PathToWindowOrDoor commands will begin with **!ptwod**. This will then be followedby a space a double dash preceding a keyword and options group. This looks like this: **!ptwod --keyWord|option1|option2|...**
### Converting Windows

Convert windows using the !ptwod --convertWindows or !ptwod --convertWindows|page commandsby appending the **|page** part, you restrict the script to apply only on the page you are looking at right now instead of all at once #### Windows converted as : - Windows => Roll20 Windows Locked by default

### Converting Doors

Convert doors using the !ptwod --convertDoors or !ptwod --convertDoors|page commandsby appending the **|page** part, you restrict the script to apply only on the page you are looking at right now instead of all at once #### Doors converted as : - Hidden => Roll20 Secret doors Locked by default - Locked => Roll20 Locked doors - Unlocked => Normal Roll20 doors **All doors are closed by default**

### Special Thanks Thanks to Scott C.h, this script is started from his DoorKnocker work which i stripped and adapted to fit my needs and learn a things or two.
